channel.title: Misleading links
channel.description:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=117637]Pandahead[/url]
getting more users. I KNOW THIS IS A STUPIED POST BUT, IM SICK OF THIS. ok, ive notice in signitures its like: click here for the brand new client. well thats misleading. it brings you to some whacked out web site. now i remember their was a rule like this: if a link says it goes to google it better bring us to google, etc,. lemme get to the point, signutures should be more moderated. to keep away porn sites, black market sites, and so on. please make it stop, ive seen atleast 5 members with a misleading link. PLEASE DONT FLAME, I JUST WANT THE COMMUNITY TO BE MORE CLEANER.

item.title: Misleading links
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

shadow235:

Then again. Mopar isn’t very strict about his Terms of Service.

Errr, misleading links only apply to shock sites.

Read full topic

item.title: Misleading links
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

This is against the TOS. If people are using misleading links, You should report them, Then again. Mopar isn’t very strict about his Terms of Service.

Read full topic

item.title: Misleading links
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:2, topic:107564”]Yeah. Like the B. Spears (Can’t spell lol), The 455 Server with Construction, etc… And just go to a site that says “___ Stole your soul! ___ souls have been stolen by ___!”

Not… That I… Clicked on them… Or anything… :|[/quote]

Mind distortion shit or whatever.

Read full topic

item.description:

cant touch this93:

ooo i hvae dyslexia and read it as “is it that time of mouth for you” my b…=p

lol, ive just not been feeling good and ive been strested all these days…and i hate sites that are gay and say i steal you soul.

item.description:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:6, topic:107564”][quote author=MybJames link=topic=153976.msg1450312#msg1450312 date=1181303181]

Harden up, and l2 pm.
[/quote]
stfu. dont spam this forum.[/quote]
Is it that time of month for you?
His post may have been a little harsh, but it’s true.

item.title: Misleading links
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Itachi Uchiha:

Quote button to check thats where it really leads?

Or mouse over, I’ve gotten into the practice of doing that before following anylinks, it only takes like ~2s to do… But yeah it’s up to staff to punish rule breakers so the most you can do is report whoever is breaking the rules.

Read full topic
